name: Dungeon Crawler Demo (MulticoloredLion14)
description:
Welcome to Dungeon Crawler! Navigate through the dungeon and collect crates and rewards.

This is only a prototype, I will be adding sound effects, enemies, more rewards, and much more!

In this version of the game you can only run and navigate through the dungeon. Crates don't work. When you reach the door you will be greeted with a message.

Hope people like it!

Controls: WASD
